TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.CheckedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示包含清單檢視控制項中所核取項目索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection containing the indexes to the checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存放區索引中的選取項目以控制項。A stores the indexes to the checked items in a control. 可以選取項目，只有當的屬性控制設為 `true`。Items can be checked only if the property of the control is set to `true`. 索引儲存在內的索引放置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 存放區中顯示的所有項目控制項。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表會如何的範例儲存的項目以及其在範例中的核取狀態控制項。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their checked states in an example control. |索引Index|項目Item|檢查在 ListView 中的狀態Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未選取Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已核取Checked| |22|Item3Item3|未選取Unchecked| |33|Item4Item4|已核取Checked| |44|Item5Item5|已核取Checked| 根據上表中的範例下, 表會示範如何會出現。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中的核取項目的索引Index of checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用這個類別的方法與屬性來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否從索引位置是儲存在索引的其中一個。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道的項目是集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷中的索引位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您判斷是否從索引位置是儲存在已選取索引的其中一個。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the checked indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道的項目位於選取的索引集合，您可以使用方法，以判斷中的索引位置。Once you know that an item is in the checked index collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

summary.span: 取得集合中的項目數目。

The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷在選取的項目數目。This property enables you to determine the number of checked items in the . 然後，當您逐一查看集合的值，而且必須提供執行迴圈的反覆項目的數目，您可以使用此值。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.
